thread.title: Afghan forces end deadly 13 hour Kabul hotel siege

title: Afghan forces end deadly 13 hour Kabul hotel siege
text:
Afghan forces end deadly 13 hour Kabul hotel siege   01:30 
Gunmen in army uniforms who stormed Kabul's Intercontinental Hotel late on Saturday and battled Afghan Special Forces through the night killed at least 19 people and wounded 12 more, although the final toll of dead and wounded may still be higher.   
Gunmen in army uniforms who stormed Kabul's Intercontinental Hotel late on Saturday and battled Afghan Special Forces through the night killed at least 19 people and wounded 12 more, although the final toll of dead and wounded may still be higher.  //reut.rs/2mVImim
